attributes.title: This app is ✨H O T  G A R B A G E ✨
attributes.review: This app is literal hot garbage🔥🗑 . I tried to take it to my local recycling ♻️center to recycle♻️ (I’m trying to live a more environmentally ⛰🥦conscious life) and they told me that what I had was garbage🗑 so I had to take it to the dump. This app must be deleted because you cannot recycle♻️ it because it is too dirty, therefore it is not environmentally friendly💗🥰♻️🥦⛰✨

attributes.title: Disappointed
attributes.review: At first I couldn’t wait to see what the app was offering but I was totally bummed out because  I was expecting to see Barron but instead got an orange man not sure if it’s a glitch but horrible app don’t waste your time unless you want it to cause you brain damage for eternity.

attributes.title: caused family drama
attributes.review: my mom caught me with this app and it caused total chaos. she started goin crazy man, you’d think she was insane. my dad tried to get her to calm down but she wouldn’t. she hates trump. she wouldn’t stop talking about me having the app for WEEKS. it caused my dad to get a divorce. also drains phone battery very quickly.

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: this app takes way too long to download and it takes way too long to actually open up and when it does open up it crashes. also trump is about to realize what its like to have his app deleted

This app was TERRIBLE!!!!!! It always crashed and even put a virus on my phone. Now I have to buy a whole new phone just because our own president can’t make a working app. If you were thinking about downloading this app DON’T! It needs to be removed ASAP!!! This is simply unacceptable 😾

attributes.title: Absolutely awful
attributes.review: As soon as I downloaded this app a virus appeared on my screen and deleted all of my pictures in my camera roll and replaced them with pictures of Donald trump and then the app told me that I could get them back if I vote for trump in the upcoming election. Please don’t ever purchase this app!

attributes.title: disappointed:(
attributes.review: It took a while to download but not so bad compared to these other reviews. But once I got on there and glitched and I had to turn my phone completely off and back on. Every time I get on my phone crashes. Terrible app. Don’t download.

attributes.title: Disgusting
attributes.review: This app is horrible after taking HOURS to download it made my phone have a glitch it started glitching whenever I went into any other app besides this one then I got multiple calls telling me that I had to vote for trump this upcoming election which is very rude in my opinion. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS

attributes.title: Let’s blow this up🥰
attributes.review:
Trump is trash🤮 just like his supporters ☺️😘✨💗🧚🏾. This made me come to a conclusion, the only reason he mad is because we made him big sad. Try again Gen-Z a bunch of trollz. We think this funny even if you get rid of it you can’t get rid of us so try again luv.😌

And that’s on Periodt 🧚🏾✨💞💖💕

attributes.title: Do not download
attributes.review: This app took over 7 HOURS to download! I opened it and it deleted all of my photos and deleted all of my data on my phone all of my social media’s got hacked and it was just awful please don not download if you don’t want your phone to get wiped out completely
